overview:
Matthew is the Executive Chairman and Co Founder of the Web Personalization start-up Ozmota. The start-up, funded by founders and private placement, is focused on personalizing the worldâ€™s extreme and fast growing corpus of knowledge represented through people, within the web and online data.

Previously Matthew was CEO SouthWing, SVP Sony Ericsson, President 3Com International, Asia Pacific/EMEA

He has 20 Yrs Leadership, Operations, Sales & Marketing and 10 Yrs R&D and Product Management experience and has been instrumental in building businesses in high growth contestable technology markets. With an entrepreneurial bent and vision of mobile combined with the internet tilt towards real time signals curated for a personalized web experience, Matthew founded Ozmota.
